short_summary: Atlassian Software Solution renewal or equivalent
description: This is a requirement for the provision of Atlassian Software Solutions renewal or equivalent. The contract is for 13 months and worth CAD 1121200. The contract was issued by the Buying Centre of the Canada Border Services Agency under the organization code of SSC
duration_in_months: Our contract duration is for 13 months standard period. The contract duration may be extended up to 13 additional months.
